item.title: Supporting HTTP/3 at the ingress gateway in Istio
item.description: A few months ago I contributed experimental HTTP/3 support at the Istio ingress gateway (PR). For the HTTPS gateway servers which terminate the TLS at the gateway, it automatically adds a mirror HTTP/3 listener over QUIC provided that there is an open UDP port. If there is an HTTPS server on TCP port 443, then an HTTP/3 server is automatically created on UDP port 443 as illustrated in the diagram below. All you need to do is to flip a switch on pilot and open UDP ports.
